title: Blackwell Ultra 2.5x 之後：AI 晶片同漲，市場在重算哪三條曲線？
title_en: After Blackwell Ultra 2.5x: The three curves the AI chip rally is repricing
newsletter_subject: NVDA +4.2%、AMD +2.8%、AVGO +1.9%：推理成本曲線下移再定價
excerpt: CES 2026 的 Blackwell Ultra 把推理效能推升 2.5x、能效改善 +40%，NVDA 放量 1.8x 收漲 4.2%，AMD/AVGO 同步走強。市場重算的核心不是規格，而是推理單位成本、效能/瓦與雲端 Capex 前置三條曲線；以及 52.3x P/E 對同業 41.95x 的 25% 溢價是否有交付與定價權支撐。

meta.og_title: Blackwell Ultra 2.5x 後的再定價：AI 晶片三巨頭同漲
meta.og_description: 推理效能 2.5x、能效 +40% 只是起點，真正被重算的是三條曲線與估值溢價。

executive_summary.en:
NVIDIA's CES 2026 keynote introduced Blackwell Ultra with 2.5x inference performance and 40% better energy efficiency, and the market treated it as a sector-wide repricing event. NVDA rose 4.2% on 1.8x its 20-day average volume, while AMD gained 2.8% as the MI400 Azure design win moved closer to Q2 2026 production, and AVGO added 1.9% on AI ASIC expansion with hyperscaler customers.

The key takeaway is not the product headline but the inference cost curve. Investors are reassessing whether inference unit economics fall fast enough to pull forward cloud capex, ease power and cooling bottlenecks, and keep utilization high without eroding pricing power. Those variables now drive sector positioning more than spec-sheet comparisons.

On valuation, NVDA trades at 52.3x P/E versus the peer median of 41.95x, a 25% premium supported by 70.1% gross margin and platform stickiness. To justify the $262.79 analyst target, the market would need to tolerate an implied 72.8x multiple-meaning clearer delivery visibility and sustained pricing discipline. If the premium compresses to peer median, the implied price is closer to $151.

Watch list: AMD's 1/6 CES details on MI400 production timing, NVDA's 1/8 earnings call for delivery and pricing language, and hyperscaler adoption signals from AWS/Azure/GCP that clarify whether this is a short-term trade or a longer cycle shift.

thesis: Blackwell Ultra 把推理成本與能效曲線往下推，市場真正重算的是雲端部署是否前置，以及 52.3x 溢價能否靠交付與定價權續航，而非單純新品規格。
